short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the biggest title in the HTML colored as tie dye.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Make Your Life - Tie Dye," your versatile extension that brings the vibrant art of tie-dye to your digital world.

Transform your web browsing experience into a psychedelic masterpiece as "Make Your Life - Tie Dye" seamlessly applies eye-catching tie-dye patterns to the largest title elements on most webpages you visit.

Infuse your online interactions with a splash of creativity and color.
Enjoy a unique and visually stimulating way to enhance your web page titles.
Embrace the groovy spirit of the '60s and add a touch of retro charm to your digital life.
"Make Your Life - Tie Dye" is simple to use and requires no technical expertise. Simply install the extension, and it will automatically begin transforming the biggest titles on the web pages you visit.

Make your life a little more colorful with "Make Your Life - Tie Dye" and let the tie-dye spirit guide you through the digital world!
